section_title: PROPOSAL TO AMEND UNFCCC ANNEXES I AND II
sentences: During the formal Plenary meeting on Monday, 20 November, Turkey, an observer State, called for its removal from the group of Annex II Parties and requested to be considered an Annex I Party with special circumstances.
On Friday, 24 November, President Pronk reported on relevant consultations held and invited Parties to consider the amendment proposal at the next session of the SBI, for definitive action at COP-7.
The US, Pakistan and Kazakhstan supported the proposal made by Turkey and this issue was deferred to SB-14.
enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
